item.title: Fairy Gardens,Fairy a Garden Set with Planting Tools,Fairy House Kit for 5,6,7,8,9,10,11,12 Year Old Boys and Girls to Play and Plant,Suitable for Children as Birthday Gifts

item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:09:50 UTC – Details)



„ÄêCreate Your Own Magic Cottage„Äë:This fairy house set lets your little one grow plants using the included soil,gardening tools.Observe the whole process of plants from sowing,germination,flowering,and fruiting,experience the fun of planting,and feel the tenacity of life in nature.You can also add your favorite plants or flowers to create your own magic gardens for even more fun.
„ÄêA kids Garden Suitable for Cultivating STEM„Äë:This flower garden toy allows your child to experience the full process of plant growth: planting,growing,flowering,fruiting.In the process, children can take a closer look at their own small garden, connect with nature through the garden set, and learn about botany and the life cycle of plants.Planting a fairy gardens is a great activity that develops planting skills, responsibility and confidence.
„ÄêFairy Gardens Craft Kit„Äë:The fairy house kit includes a shovel, water can, garden toy rake, pink flower pot, mushroom house, fairy tale house,table and chairs,2 soils,and instructions for the children’s plant growth kit.With these garden tools,kids can grow their own fairy house and even decorate with some pebbles,garden toys or other fun things to play in the magical fairy world you create!
„ÄêStart Growing Your Magic Cottage Magical Cottage„Äë: Install the main body of the fairy hut following the instructions included,soak the soil in water,pour it over the upper and lower parts of the pot,place the plant in the soil with a tool.Water the plant as needed and make sure it also gets sunlight.You can play your magical gardening play set indoors or out!Watch your garden every day to see the plant sprout and grow,as well as plant your favorite flowers.
„ÄêUnique Gifts for Kids„Äë:Magic kids garden kits for girls and boys ages 3 and up are unique gifts for little ones on birthdays,Christmas, Thanksgiving and more.Children will have fun looking after their magic garden.This toy is suitable for children over 3 years old.For safety reasons,it is recommended that parents accompany children to play together.If you have any questions about toy flower garden,please feel free to contact us.We will get back to you within 24 hours.

Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:09:50 UTC – Details)

item.content:encoded:
Price: $17.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:27:46 UTC – Details)

Product Description

This children’s winter glove has attractive appearance, The surface adopts knitted and thickened cloth with leather logo, making the cap look trendy.

The cold weather gloves are perfect for indoor and outdoor activities like hiking, skiing, cycling, camping, mountain climbing and shopping.

The short plush lining makes the kids running gloves feel soft and comfortable and preserves better heat and maximum warmth for you to against the chilly winter and cold wind.

Moreover, the logo is fixed on the side of the cap via dedicated sewing process. Delicate and smooth stitching thread without easily split sewing, making it more durable and ensuring maximum comfort

Size ChartÔºö

S: total length 7.1”/18cm; palm width 3.1”/8cm; length of thumb 3.4”/8.7cm; suitable for kids aged 4-6 years oldM: total length 7.5”/19cm; palm width 3.3”/8.5cm; length of thumb 3.5”/9Cm; suitable for kids aged 6-8 years oldL: total length 7.7”/19.5cm; palm width 3.5”/9cm; length of thumb 3.6”/9.3cm; suitable for kids aged 8-10 years oldXL: total length 7.9”/20cm; palm width 3.7”/9.5cm; length of thumb 3.7”/9.5cm; suitable for kids aged 10-12 years old

Touchscreen Gloves for Boys Girls

The children’s warm gloves are equipped with touchscreen conductive fabrics on the thumb and index/middle finger, your kids will not take off the thermal gloves in cold weather to use mobile phones tablets or other electronic products

The upgraded touch screen conductive fabrics makes the touchscreen working experience is more sensitive, more durable

Anti-slip Kids Gloves

The non-slip silicone with smile pattern on the whole palm extends to the fingers for a stronger gripÔºå reducing potential hazards due to skiddingWhen children are playing with electronic products such as mobile phones and tablets, they can better hold them in their hands to avoid damage caused by falling itemsWhen children are riding bicycles, climbing and other outdoor activities, they can grasp the handrails more favorably to avoid danger due to letting go

the characteristics of silver fox velvet Delicate texture Soft No pilling no fading

silver fox velvet has a soft and delicate hand, and the fabric has excellent elasticity, so the fabric can quickly recover after being pulled or deformed without leaving wrinkles.

Waterproof Children’s Gloves

The toddler sports gloves are made of composite fabric with spandex and mixed silver fox velvet, making our warm kids winter gloves lightweight and durable, as well as waterproof and windproof.

The short plush lining makes the kids running gloves feel soft and comfortable, and preserves better heat and maximum warmth for you to against the chilly winter and cold wind

Date First Available ‚Äè : ‚Äé August 19, 2022
Manufacturer ‚Äè : ‚Äé AOTOW
ASIN ‚Äè : ‚Äé B0BB7MCC7Z

elastic closure
High-Quality Fabric Winter Gloves – The toddler sports gloves are made of composite fabric with spandex and mixed silver fox velvet, making our warm kids winter gloves lightweight and durable, as well as waterproof and windproof. The children can play happily in rain and snow with our full-finger gloves.
Anti-Slip Silicone Kids Gloves – The non-slip silicone with smile pattern on the whole palm extends to the fingers for a stronger gripÔºå reducing potential hazards due to skidding.
Sensitive Touch Screen Gloves – The children gloves have a touch screen function at the thumb index finger and middle finger, allowing children to use electronic devices such as phones and tablets without taking off gloves to avoid frostbite hands in cold weather
Comfortable & Warm Children Gloves – The boys cycling gloves have thickened liners with silver fox velvet to keep the winter gloves more comfortable warmer & less bulky.
Ideal Gift for Kids – This winter glove is suitable for indoor and outdoor activities, such as using phones and tablets, hiking, running, cycling, etc. It’s a great gift for your kids.
